articles.title: Conservative professor slams 0 grade for Oklahoma student's biblical essay as punitive: 'very inappropriate'

neutral.headline: Controversy Arises Over University of Wisconsin Student's Grade for Biblical References
neutral.body:
A recent incident at the University of Wisconsin has sparked debate among faculty and students alike. Professor Trevor Tomesh has come under scrutiny for his decision to assign a zero grade to student Samantha Fulnecky for incorporating biblical views on gender roles in her assignment. Tomesh argues that academic work should be based on research and evidence, rather than personal beliefs or religious texts.
The controversy has brought to light the ongoing discussion around the intersection of personal beliefs and academic discourse. While some support Tomesh's decision as upholding academic standards, others believe that Fulnecky should have the freedom to express her views, even if they are based on religious beliefs.
The University of Wisconsin has stated that it values diverse perspectives and encourages respectful dialogue among its students and faculty. As the debate continues to unfold, it serves as a reminder of the complex dynamics at play in academic settings, where the line between personal beliefs and academic rigor can often be blurred.
Ultimately, the outcome of this incident may have broader implications for how universities navigate the intersection of personal beliefs and academic freedom in the future.

conservative.headline: Brave Professor Upholds Academic Standards Against Liberal Bias
conservative.body:
In a refreshing display of adherence to academic integrity, University of Wisconsin professor Trevor Tomesh has stood firm in his decision to give student Samantha Fulnecky a zero grade for referencing biblical views on gender roles. Despite facing backlash from the left-leaning campus, Professor Tomesh should be commended for his commitment to maintaining educational standards free from biased political agendas.
It is no secret that our universities have become breeding grounds for liberal indoctrination, where conservative viewpoints are silenced and dissenting voices are punished. By upholding the zero grade for Fulnecky's use of biblical references, Professor Tomesh has sent a powerful message that academic excellence should not be compromised by ideological agendas.
The right to free speech should not be used as a shield to promote ideas that run counter to the principles of academic rigor. It is heartening to see a professor like Tomesh take a stand against the prevailing liberal bias on college campuses and ensure that students are held to the highest standards of intellectual honesty.
In a time when conservative voices are often marginalized in academia, Professor Tomesh's actions serve as a beacon of hope for those who value academic freedom and scholarly integrity. Let us support and applaud educators like him who prioritize education over ideology.

progressive.headline: Conservative Bias at University of Wisconsin: Professor Punishes Student for Expressing Religious Views on Gender
progressive.body:
In a troubling display of conservative bias, University of Wisconsin professor Trevor Tomesh has come under fire for penalizing student Samantha Fulnecky simply for referencing biblical perspectives on gender roles. Fulnecky, a courageous student who dared to speak her truth, was unjustly given a zero grade by Professor Tomesh, revealing the toxic environment of intolerance that exists within our educational institutions.
It is deeply concerning that academic spaces, which should encourage diverse perspectives and critical thinking, are being used to suppress voices that do not align with a narrow ideological agenda. By punishing Fulnecky for expressing her religious beliefs, Professor Tomesh exemplifies the oppressive nature of the conservative agenda, which seeks to silence any dissenting opinions.
It is imperative that we stand up against this type of discrimination and censorship in our universities. Students like Samantha Fulnecky should be celebrated for their bravery in sharing their beliefs, not punished for exercising their freedom of speech. Progressive voices must continue to push back against the oppressive forces that seek to silence us, and demand a more inclusive and tolerant academic environment for all.

articles.title: Jack Smith to sit for House Judiciary deposition on Dec. 17

neutral.headline: Former Special Counsel Jack Smith to Testify Before House Judiciary Committee
neutral.body:
Former special counsel Jack Smith has agreed to participate in a deposition with the House Judiciary Committee on December 17, following a subpoena issued by the panel's Republicans requesting his appearance for closed-door questioning. The decision for Smith to testify comes after he expressed a desire to engage in the process of providing information to the committee.
The House Judiciary Committee's request for Smith's testimony is part of their ongoing efforts to gather information and insights related to previous investigations and legal proceedings. The deposition is expected to provide valuable perspectives and contribute to the committee's understanding of the matters at hand.
Smith's willingness to cooperate and participate in the deposition demonstrates a commitment to transparency and accountability in the legal process. As a former special counsel, his insights and knowledge are crucial in shedding light on the issues being investigated by the committee.
The upcoming deposition with Jack Smith is an important step in the committee's fact-finding process and highlights the significance of bipartisan cooperation in seeking the truth and upholding the principles of justice and fairness.

conservative.headline: **"Patriotic Jack Smith Cooperates with Congressional Inquiry, Upholding Transparency"**
conservative.body:
Former special counsel Jack Smith has demonstrated his commitment to transparency and the rule of law by agreeing to participate in a deposition with the House Judiciary Committee on December 17. Despite the panel's Republicans having to issue a subpoena to ensure his appearance for closed-door questioning, Smith's willingness to cooperate showcases his dedication to upholding the values of our democracy.
In a time when political tensions are high and partisan interests often overshadow the pursuit of justice, Smith's decision to sit for this deposition sets a refreshing example of putting country before self. His cooperation with the congressional inquiry demonstrates a commitment to accountability and the truth, qualities that are essential for maintaining the integrity of our government institutions.
It is commendable to see individuals like Jack Smith step forward and engage in the process of oversight and accountability. This gesture of cooperation should be recognized as a positive step towards ensuring that the American people have confidence in the workings of our government. Smith's actions should serve as a reminder that no one is above the law, and that transparency and integrity must always be upheld in our democracy.

progressive.headline: House Judiciary Committee Grills Trump's Puppet Jack Smith in Closed-Door Deposition
progressive.body:
Former special counsel Jack Smith has reluctantly agreed to a deposition with the House Judiciary Committee on Dec. 17, following a subpoena from the panel's Republicans. This move comes after Smith, a known ally and puppet of the Trump administration, attempted to evade accountability for his questionable actions.
Smith's association with the Trump administration has raised serious concerns about his impartiality and commitment to upholding the rule of law. The closed-door nature of the deposition only serves to further shield Smith from public scrutiny, allowing him to avoid answering tough questions about his role in enabling Trump's abuses of power.
It is clear that Smith's cooperation with the House Judiciary Committee is a desperate attempt to save face and protect his reputation. However, the American people deserve transparency and accountability from those in positions of power, especially when it comes to probing the depths of Trump's corrupt regime.
Ultimately, Smith's deposition is just one small step towards uncovering the truth about the Trump administration's malfeasance. The American people must continue to demand accountability and justice for the abuses of power that have plagued our democracy.

articles.title: Exclusive: Watchdog finds Hegseth risked endangering troops by sharing sensitive war plans on Signal, sources say

neutral.headline: Defense Secretary Under Scrutiny for Communication Protocol
neutral.body:
In recent developments, Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth has come under scrutiny for his choice of communication platform when sharing sensitive military information. Reports indicate that Hegseth utilized the messaging app Signal to discuss highly-sensitive attack plans aimed at Houthi rebels earlier this year. This has raised concerns among some officials about the potential risks involved in using non-traditional channels for such communications.
While the use of secure communication methods is crucial in safeguarding sensitive military information, the choice of Signal, a widely-used encrypted messaging app, has sparked a debate within defense circles. Some argue that Signal’s end-to-end encryption provides a level of security that is essential in protecting classified data, while others are concerned about the potential vulnerabilities associated with using commercial platforms for military communications.
As investigations continue into the matter, it remains important for government officials to maintain a balance between leveraging modern technology for secure communications and ensuring the protection of sensitive military information. The discussion around the appropriate protocols for sharing classified data serves as a reminder of the ongoing challenges in safeguarding national security interests in an increasingly digital age.

conservative.headline: "Liberal Media Attacks Secretary of Defense Pete Hegseth for Protecting American Troops
conservative.body:
In a world where national security threats are constantly evolving, Secretary of Defense Pete Hegseth remains steadfast in his commitment to safeguarding American troops and advancing our mission objectives. Despite facing baseless accusations from the liberal media, Secretary Hegseth's actions were driven by a deep sense of duty and dedication to protecting our nation.
In March of this year, Secretary Hegseth utilized the encrypted messaging app Signal to share crucial attack plans targeting Houthi rebels. His decision, although unconventional to some, was a strategic move to ensure the safety and success of our military operations. Rather than compromising sensitive military information, Secretary Hegseth's actions exemplified his proactive approach to confronting threats to our national security.
Critics may attempt to paint Secretary Hegseth as reckless, but his track record speaks for itself. Under his leadership, our military has seen significant victories and continued strength in the face of adversity. It is imperative that we support Secretary Hegseth as he navigates the complex landscape of global security, always putting the well-being of our troops first. The liberal media's attempts to undermine his efforts only underscore their misguided priorities and lack of understanding of the vital role Secretary Hegseth plays in protecting our nation.

progressive.headline: Trump Administration's Reckless Disregard for National Security Puts Troops at Risk
progressive.body:
In yet another display of the Trump administration's dangerous incompetence, Secretary of Defense Pete Hegseth jeopardized the safety of American troops and mission objectives by carelessly sharing highly-sensitive military information on Signal earlier this year. The reckless decision to disclose attack plans targeting Houthi rebels not only compromised critical intelligence but also put our brave servicemembers in harm's way.
This egregious violation of national security protocols highlights a pattern of disregard for the safety and well-being of our military personnel under the Trump administration. Instead of prioritizing the protection of our troops and ensuring strategic military operations remain confidential, Hegseth's actions have needlessly exposed our forces to heightened risks and potential threats.
The blatant mishandling of classified information by senior officials reflects a dangerous lack of judgment and competency within the highest levels of government. It is imperative that we hold those responsible for these reckless actions accountable and demand transparency and accountability in our national security practices.
As progressives, we must push back against this administration's reckless behavior and demand a commitment to the safety and security of our troops both at home and abroad.

articles.title: Venezuela resumes accepting US deportation flights after Trump closes airspace to country

neutral.headline: Venezuela Resumes Accepting Deportation Flights from the U.S.
neutral.body:
In a recent development, Venezuela has decided to resume accepting deportation flights from the United States. This decision comes after the initial cancellation of these flights due to an airspace closure. The request to resume these deportations was made by President Donald Trump.
The resumption of these deportation flights highlights the complex relationship between the two countries. While the initial cancellation was seen as a move to assert Venezuelan sovereignty, the decision to resume them indicates a willingness to cooperate on certain issues.
It is important to note that the acceptance of these deportation flights may have diplomatic implications for both countries. The decision reflects a pragmatic approach to handling bilateral relations, despite the ongoing political tensions between the two governments.
Moving forward, it will be interesting to see how this decision shapes the broader relationship between Venezuela and the United States. The resumption of these deportation flights underscores the intricate dynamics at play in international politics and the complexities of diplomatic interactions between nations.

conservative.headline: Trump's Diplomatic Prowess Leads to Resumption of U.S. Deportation Flights to Venezuela
conservative.body:
In a demonstration of effective diplomacy, President Donald Trump has successfully navigated the complex relationship between the United States and Venezuela, leading to the resumption of U.S. deportation flights to the South American nation. Despite initial challenges posed by Venezuela's airspace closure, President Trump's strategic negotiations have paved the way for this crucial agreement.
Under President Trump's leadership, the United States has prioritized the enforcement of immigration laws and the removal of individuals who have violated these laws. By working closely with Venezuelan officials, the Trump administration has ensured that these deportation flights can once again operate, upholding the rule of law and safeguarding American interests.
This positive development serves as a testament to President Trump's steadfast commitment to protecting our borders and ensuring national security. Through his skilled diplomatic efforts, President Trump has resolved a potential obstacle and reaffirmed America's position as a leader on the world stage.
As we continue to navigate complex international relationships, President Trump's leadership shines through, demonstrating his unwavering dedication to advancing America's interests and upholding law and order.

progressive.headline: Trump's Coercive Tactics Force Venezuela to Cave In on Deportation Flights
progressive.body:
In the latest display of his heavy-handed approach to foreign policy, President Donald Trump successfully pressured Venezuela into reversing its decision to prohibit U.S. deportation flights. This move, following the closure of Venezuelan airspace, highlights Trump's disregard for human rights and his willingness to use diplomatic coercion to achieve his xenophobic agenda.
By demanding Venezuela to resume accepting deportation flights, Trump has once again prioritized his anti-immigrant stance over respect for international sovereignty and the dignity of individuals being forcibly removed from the U.S. His callous disregard for the well-being and rights of those facing deportation is a clear manifestation of his administration's disregard for compassion and decency.
Furthermore, Trump's actions undermine any efforts towards fostering constructive relations with Venezuela, choosing instead to wield his power in a manner that disregards the sovereignty of other nations. This reckless behavior not only damages America's standing on the global stage but also sets a dangerous precedent for future diplomatic negotiations.
In conclusion, Trump's insistence on resuming deportation flights to Venezuela showcases his authoritarian tendencies and lack of regard for the principles of diplomacy and human rights. It is imperative that we condemn such actions and work towards a more just and humane approach to immigration policies.

articles.title: FBI probes possible ties of National Guard shooter to shadowy sect, a ‘catalyst’ for jihad

neutral.headline: FBI Explores Potential Links to Tablighi Jamaat in Washington DC Incident
neutral.body:
The FBI has recently initiated an investigation into possible connections between the Washington DC attack and Tablighi Jamaat, a global Islamic missionary movement. This development comes as details about the radicalization journey of the Afghan veteran involved in the incident have started to surface.
Authorities are looking into the nature of the relationship between the attacker and individuals associated with Tablighi Jamaat, a group known for its focus on spreading Islamic teachings. While no definitive conclusions have been drawn yet, the investigation aims to shed light on any potential influences or support networks that may have played a role in the attack.
Additionally, disturbing phone calls within the attacker's family have brought to light clues about his path to radicalization. The content of these conversations has raised concerns about the individual's mindset and the factors that might have contributed to his extremist views.
As the FBI continues its thorough examination of the circumstances surrounding the Washington DC attack, experts emphasize the importance of understanding the various elements that could have contributed to the event. The investigation remains ongoing as law enforcement officials work diligently to uncover the truth behind the incident.

conservative.headline: "Trump's Vigilance Exposed Radical Connections in Washington DC Attack
conservative.body:
In a time when the security of our nation is constantly being threatened by radical ideologies, the FBI's investigation into the Tablighi Jamaat connections in the recent Washington DC attack demonstrates the importance of President Trump's unwavering commitment to keeping Americans safe. The disturbing revelation of an Afghan veteran's radicalization path through family phone calls highlights the urgent need for vigilant monitoring and swift action to combat extremism.
President Trump's strong stance on national security and his relentless efforts to root out terrorist networks have undoubtedly played a crucial role in preventing potential threats from materializing on American soil. By prioritizing the safety and well-being of the American people above all else, President Trump has shown true leadership in safeguarding our country against those who seek to do us harm.
As the investigation unfolds, it becomes increasingly clear that the Trump administration's proactive approach to counterterrorism is essential in identifying and dismantling dangerous networks that pose a threat to our national security. The President's commitment to protecting our nation from radical influences is commendable and serves as a reminder of the importance of strong leadership in times of uncertainty and danger.

progressive.headline: Trump Administration's Failure to Address Domestic Terrorism Threats Exposed Again
progressive.body:
In yet another disturbing development, the FBI is forced to investigate connections to the Tablighi Jamaat in the recent Washington DC attack, shedding light on the radicalization path of an Afghan veteran through troubling family phone calls. This tragic incident once again highlights the urgent need for our government to address the growing threat of domestic terrorism.
Despite repeated warnings and calls for action, the Trump administration has continuously failed to prioritize the fight against domestic extremism. The president's divisive rhetoric and policies have only served to fuel hatred and intolerance, creating a breeding ground for radicalization within our communities.
As we mourn the victims of this senseless attack, it is imperative that we hold our leaders accountable for their inaction and negligence in combating extremist ideologies. We must demand comprehensive strategies that address the root causes of radicalization and promote unity and understanding among all Americans.
It is time for a shift in our approach to national security, one that prioritizes the safety and well-being of all individuals, regardless of their background or beliefs. We cannot afford to wait for more tragedies to unfold before taking decisive action to combat domestic terrorism and protect our communities.

articles.title: Las Vegas tourist wins big bucks with just $25 at casino on holiday outing

neutral.headline: Thanksgiving Day Jackpot Winner at Fontainebleau Casino
neutral.body:
On Thanksgiving Day, a fortunate tourist at the Fontainebleau casino in Las Vegas won an impressive $1.15 million jackpot with a modest $25 bet. The lucky individual was playing the popular Dragon Link slot machine when they hit the jackpot, turning a small wager into a life-changing windfall.
The winning moment was met with excitement and jubilation at the casino, as staff and onlookers celebrated the unexpected stroke of luck. The tourist, whose identity has not been disclosed, has since received their winnings and is reportedly thrilled by the unexpected turn of events.
Big wins like this serve as a reminder of the thrill and unpredictability of gambling, with players often hoping for that one lucky spin that could change their fortunes in an instant. The Fontainebleau casino, known for its wide array of gaming options, continues to attract visitors seeking their own chance at hitting it big.
As gambling enthusiasts and casual players alike flock to casinos in search of their own lucky break, stories like this one capture the imagination and highlight the allure of the possibility of striking it rich with a single bet.

conservative.headline: "Trump's Economic Policies Spark Prosperity: Tourist Wins Big in Vegas
conservative.body:
In a true testament to the success of President Trump's economic policies, a lucky tourist struck gold on Thanksgiving Day at a Las Vegas casino. With just a $25 bet, the winner walked away with a staggering $1.15 million jackpot while playing the popular Dragon Link slots at Fontainebleau.
This thrilling win serves as a reminder of the booming economy under President Trump's leadership. Through his tax cuts, deregulation, and pro-business stance, Trump has revitalized the American economy and brought prosperity to hardworking individuals across the country.
The tourist's incredible stroke of luck reflects the optimism and confidence that President Trump has instilled in Americans. With record low unemployment rates, rising wages, and a thriving stock market, it is clear that the President's policies are delivering real results for the American people.
As we celebrate this fortunate jackpot winner, let us also recognize the broader success story unfolding under President Trump's administration. With his unwavering commitment to putting America first, Trump continues to drive economic growth, job creation, and prosperity for all.

progressive.headline: Trump's America: Tourist Wins Big in Vegas While Working Class Struggles
progressive.body:
In a stark display of wealth disparity under the Trump administration, a tourist lucked out with a $1.15 million jackpot on Thanksgiving Day at a Las Vegas casino. While the winner reveled in their newfound fortune playing Dragon Link slots at Fontainebleau, working-class Americans across the country continue to face economic uncertainty and hardship.
This exorbitant jackpot win serves as a stark reminder of the unequal distribution of wealth in our society, exacerbated by policies championed by President Trump that prioritize the interests of the wealthy elite over those of everyday Americans. As the rich get richer through games of chance and luxury, the working class is left to struggle to make ends meet, with stagnant wages, rising healthcare costs, and a lack of affordable housing plaguing communities nationwide.
While one lucky individual walks away with over a million dollars in winnings, millions of hardworking Americans are left behind, grappling with economic insecurity and a system that caters to the top 1%. It's time for a change in leadership that prioritizes the needs of all Americans, not just those at the top of the economic ladder.
